name: SobeVillas.com
tag_list: luxury-vacation-rentals, miami-beach-vacation, luxury-rentals, villa-rental, mansion-rental, miami-beach-vacation-home, setai, hotels, miami-setai, miami, hotel, luxury-hotels
overview:
SobeVillas.com is a premier luxury rental agency based out of Miami Beach, Florida. We specialize in the finest residences found in Miami, from sprawling deluxe condos to exclusive waterfront homes. The SobeVillas team of licensed realtors is at the forefront of the luxury real estate market, providing elite access to the full gamut of high-end residences sweeping across Miami.

SBV provides hotel reservations for discounted rates. You can make your booking online for a room/apartment/suite/condo in all properties which are on offer. SobeVillas.com is a perfect choice for special events, luxury vacations, honeymoons, weddings, etc.

SBV has on board a seasoned and highly qualified team of professional hoteliers. They acquired their experience and expert skills while working for years at the most famous and exquisite hotels and properties around the globe.

SBV offers an exclusive global concierge service to their clientele to cater to all their needs and desires, assure maximum comfort and satisfaction.
